name: web-tp1-html
description: First lab of web in poly, the goal is to make an html structure.

scripts.clean: mv webroot/assets tmp-assets && mv webroot/lib tmp-lib && rm -rf webroot/* log && mv tmp-assets webroot/assets && mv tmp-lib webroot/lib
scripts.watch: mkdir -p log; echo "See logs in log/gulp and log/watch";( gulp > log/gulp & bin/watch app/ > log/watch );

author: Lucas Boudereaux, Ulysse Buonomo
